description: The task is to flip a 2D numpy array representing an image horizontally.

prompts.prompt: Implement the 'flip_image' function that takes a 2D numpy array representing an image and returns the image flipped horizontally. For instance, for the input image [[1, 2], [3, 4]], the function should return [[2, 1], [4, 3]].

In image processing and data augmentation, flipping images can be a useful technique to increase the diversity of the training set. Your task is to implement the 'flip_image' function that receives a 2D numpy array representing an image. The function should flip the image horizontally. For instance, for the given image [[1, 2], [3, 4]], the horizontally flipped image will be [[2, 1], [4, 3]]. Ensure the returned image maintains the same shape as the input.
